titleStmt.title: Declaration of several baptized believers, walking in all the foundation principles of the doctrine of Christ, mentioned in Heb. 6. 1, 2
titleStmt.author: Skipp, Edmund.

notesStmt.note: Signed at bottom: Ed[m]und Skipp, Henry Grigg, Thomas Helmes ...
Date of imprint suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: cropped and torn with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
